properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 9:05PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Locust Fork At Sayre...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...Oliver Locak and Dam...and Selden Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall during the past 2 days continues to produce rises
and flooding along the Black Warrior River basin. Flood warnings
remain in effect for the Black Warrior River at Holt Lock and Dam,
Selden Lock and Dam, Oliver Lock and Dam, and the Locust Fork at Sayre.
Moderate flooding is forecast to occur at Selden Lock and Dam which may
lead to residential flooding in the surrounding area.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 8:45 PM Tuesday the stage was 101 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 104.3 feet by
early Saturday morning then begin a slow fall.
* Impact...At 102 feet...Residential flooding begins in the area.
Numerous cabins and trailers in Hale and Greene counties become flooded.
* Impact...At 105 feet...Severe residential flooding occurs in the
area...and evacuations may become necessary.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
